text: 10.27: Ais 26.11; Hi 12.29Nza fhura guigira rɨrɨva mbatɨgar muuŋgip, mba Fhe Bakɨme za kha nuianan ki gumgi gu mbigi muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi ga suaŋv, mbe suanga tugar rargɨ kɨrga. Mba Fhe Bakɨmen pani gumgi shirga vhava bakɨme, nza vhɨra guigira anan rivgi, ana guigira shirɨ mbatɨga muuŋgi. Ana mbe shiv, za mben farfagirga.
